name: You're the Devil's Maid
description:
- You're The Devil's Maid -

  • Push your vacuum around
  • Suck up litter
  • Protect yourself and your vacuum from the projectiles

Hint: You need a score of at least 40 to see all the different projectiles

Controls:

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move around.

Credits:

All programming, art, and music created by myself for the 17th ScoreSpace Jam
